department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## RFP - 5P126-230055 Medium Duty Truck

### General Information
* Reference Number: WS4294765987-Doc4298518535
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: WS4294765987
* Publication Date: 2023-11-15
* Closing Date: 2023-12-20, 14:00 EST
* Amendment Date: 2023-12-18

### Technical Description
Canada is seeking offers to provide one (1) medium-duty truck for use by the Parks Canada Agency (PC).

### Contract Details
* Contract Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: A range of free trade agreements open to this tender, including Canada-Peru, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea FTAs
* Delivery Regions: Cape Breton

### Contracting Entity
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
* Valerie Matheson (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact the Contractor for more information

### Tender Details
* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 20, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive

### Electronic Tendering Information
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18017517?extsite=MTgwMTc1MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Please visit Ariba Discovery for more information

This is a robust tender opportunity for companies interested in responding to a medium-duty truck request. Respondents will need to submit a compliant bid to the notice URL provided.mAPlease note that the tender has been modified. To submit a compliant bid, interested bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid by December 20, 2023, at 14:00 EST.</mA>
